= Server installation =
 # Start server
{{{
./bin/openfire start
}}}
 # Open http://localhost:9090 and follow installation instructions (use *Embedded Database* and set server name to *localhost*)
 # Restart server
{{{
./bin/openfire stop
./bin/openfire start
}}}
 # Open http://localhost:9090 and login as admin
 # Create user *tester* with password *12345*
 # Create persistent room *neerc*
